snippet.title: ARC Raiders: 6 Hidden Puzzles & Secret Loot Rooms You NEED To Complete in Blue Gate
snippet.description:
Blue Gate is one of the most loot-packed maps in ARC Raiders, filled with hidden puzzles, secret rooms, and massive rewards waiting to be claimed. In this guide, Codiak breaks down every major secret — from the Ancient Fort puzzle to the Reinforced Reception bunker — so you can grab rare weapons, blueprints, and premium loot fast.

0:00 Intro
0:24 Secret 1 - Ancient Fort
1:39 Secret 2 - Raiders Refuge
2:44 Secret 3 - Two Harvesters
3:54 Secret 4 - Reinforced Reception Terminal
5:01 Secret 5 - The 'Red Room'
6:35 Secret 6 - Warehouse Complex Terminal
7:37 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders
